title: Supreme Court upholds death sentence of Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev - CNN
content: Supreme Court upholds death sentence of Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev  CNNView Full Coverage on Google News
description: "Dzhokhar Tsarnaev committed heinous crimes," Justice Clarence Thomas wrote. "The Sixth Amendment nonetheless guaranteed him a fair trial before an impartial jury. He received one."
